title: Quick Tab Storage Persistence Pattern
details: Quick Tab handlers (VisibilityHandler, UpdateHandler, DestroyHandler) must persist state to storage.local after any state change. Use buildStateForStorage(quickTabsMap, minimizedManager) and persistStateToStorage(state, logPrefix) from @utils/storage-utils.js. The storage key is 'quick_tabs_state_v2'. UpdateHandler requires minimizedManager as third constructor parameter for consistent state building. Coordinated clear operations should go through background script with COORDINATED_CLEAR_ALL_QUICK_TABS message to prevent storage write storms.
